page.title: 03Employment In Nantwich.
page.content: Nantwich has a{population}of 11,867_11.5% unemployed. Of the remaining 88.5%,20% are employed in the town,and 88% commute.The two largest employers are{Rolls Royce}and British Rail _ both situated in Crewe Once a centre of small manufactuning e.g.clothing and shoes,the main {employment}now is in the service industries and the retail trade.Three small supermarkets,Woolworths and Boot's and many small specialist shops provide employment mainly for woman and young girls.Eight Estate agents four banks,five solicitors,six accountants,four dental surgeries and two health centres offer opportunity for professional skills. 18 pubs/restaurants and 13 hairdressers employ a number of young people.There are also opportunites for training with some local firms.
